Plot: One summer, four orphans boys who have grown to be the closest of friends find themselves competing for the attention of the same family.
Title: December Boys
Writer: Ronald Kinnoch (story), Michael Noonan (novel), Marc Rosenberg (screenplay)
Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Lee Cormie, Christian Byers, James Fraser
tomatoConsensus: December Boys' location and settings are invitingly gorgeous, but the coming-of-age drama that takes place on them is uneventful and far too sentimental.
